node.title: 'This isn't good enough': Defective government-funded houses to be demolished
node.alt: A man and a woman stand in masks in front of a defective Palmerston house.
node.description: The Northern Territory government will demolish and rebuild a group of dilapidated and issue-plagued Palmerston houses — but residents in another eight potentially unsafe houses will continue living in them.
node.content:
["The Northern Territory government will step in to demolish and rebuild a group of defective and problem-riddled\u00a0affordable houses.", "But residents in eight other homes constructed by the same builder will remain in their houses for now \u2014 despite the government admitting they are potentially unsafe.", "The group of 18 homes were built as part of a government-backed affordable housing scheme\u00a0in the Palmerston suburb of Bellamack.\u00a0", "They were completed\u00a0by 2013, but residents began to notice issues including water leaks, poor drainage on balconies and tiles that lifted and cracked as soon as the following year.\u00a0\u00a0", "In April this year, the government revealed an\u00a0engineering\u00a0assessment report had found the houses were structurally non-compliant and might not withstand cyclonic conditions.", "When Infrastructure Minister Eva Lawler visited one of the homes\u00a0on Friday last week, part of its balcony had\u00a0collapsed and some of the flooring was\u00a0rusting and disintegrating", "\"This isn't good enough,\" she said.", "\"It is a terrible situation when you buy a home in the Northern Territory and then you find out afterwards that it is not up to the National Construction Code.\"", "", "
A report identified defects in 18 homes that jeopardised their structural integrity.\u00a0(ABC News: Jesse Thompson)
", "Both the builder, Darwin construction identify\u00a0George Milatos, and the developer, Bellamack Pty Ltd, have previously denied responsibility for the defects.", "Asked if either party had faced consequences, Ms Lawler said that was \"the issue\" a series of building sector reforms would seek to address.", "
Three homes to be rebuilt, more razed
", "The government has not publicly released its assessment\u00a0report so the severity of the issues isn't clear, but the minister said the structures \"couldn't continue\" in their current state.", "Beginning today, the demolition will see\u00a0nine homes covered under a government insurance scheme\u00a0called the Home Building Certification Fund razed.", "The Department of Infrastructure, Planning and Logistics has agreed to buy six\u00a0of the homes and then sell the land, while another three will be rebuilt on a \"like-for-like\" basis.", "\"[The department]\u00a0will work through with the home-owners around replacement value,\" Ms Lawler said.", "\"What they have and what they want to have \u2014 there's a process around that.\"", "Those people will vacate their properties in the coming weeks, with the government to cover their relocation costs.", "The overall cost to the taxpayer isn't known.", "A 10th\u00a0home covered by that fund is owned by the developer.", "", "
Owners of the homes have reported various issues over several years.(ABC News: Jesse Thompson)
", "Another eight homes will remain intact for now because they are covered by a different insurance scheme administered by another department, the Residential Building Cover Scheme (RBCS).", "The minister said those home owners were aware of the potential danger and had received copies of the assessment report.", "She said five\u00a0home owners with RBCS\u00a0claims underway could receive up to $100,000 to rectify their houses.", "\"If they are not satisfied with the $100,000 package to rectify their homes, they can then go to the NTCAT, so the administrative tribunal, to seek additional funding for their homes,\" she said.\u00a0", "
Builder and developer 'have not stepped in'
", "The minister said she was first alerted to the defects in December 2018, but the \"ball was in the developer's and builder's court\" to rectify them.", "She said the home owners had spent years pursuing the parties with little success.", "\"This has come over a long journey\u00a0because the developer and the builder have not stepped in,\" she said.", "Mr Milatos is no longer registered in the NT and therefore cannot be investigated by a watchdog called the Building Practitioners Board.", "", "
There are 18 of the homes in the Palmerston suburb of Bellamack.(ABC News: Jesse Thompson)
", "Earlier this year, the government confirmed Bellamack Pty Ltd was continuing to develop a nearby estate called Mitchell Creek Green.", "The 18\u00a0Bellamack houses have become another example of issues plaguing the Northern Territory's residential construction sector.", "IN 2019, nine apartment buildings were\u00a0found to be structurally non-compliant and another group of 16 Palmerston homes are currently empty while potential defects are investigated.", "In a bid to stop the issues, the government has unveiled a series of sector reforms that will increase penalties for non-compliance with standards, improve professional development and install\u00a0additional checks and balances during the design stage.", "\"We need to make sure that if you're building a home in the Northern Territory, you absolutely get a quality product every time,\" she said.", "\"That's the focus of our government, making sure that every single Territorian gets a quality build when they outlay the largest amount of money most of them ever do.\"", "The government intends to implement the first round of reforms in the middle of next year."]
